data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Shihezi that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shihezi, Xinjiang Uygur, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Shihezi, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary: On average, 28 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Shihezi, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
There are 380,200 people living in the county of Shihezi. Only about 28,842 might be believers.
Spirit, teach the 28,842 believers in the county of Shihezi the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Nubra people.
Please, teach the 28,842 believers in Shihezi, Xinjiang Uygur, China how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Shihezi.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Shihezi, Xinjiang Uygur, China has a population of 380,200.

We estimate Shihezi has 28,842 people who might know Jesus, 6,142 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 345,216 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Shihezi prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
